text: Futhi zigcine ubekezela kanye nalabo ababiza iNkosi yabo ekuseni nakusihlwa befuna ubuso bayo futhi ungavumeli amehlo akho ukuthi abuke ngale kwabo ufisa ubuhle bempilo yalomhlaba futhi ungamhloniphi lowo esenze inhliziyo yakhe yangakunaki ukukhunjulwa kwethu, futhi lowo olandela izifiso zakhe ngasosonke isikhathi udaba lwakhe luyalahleka
